article_title: No political will for Medicaid expansion in Oklahoma

article_metadata.author: Sean Murphy | Associated Press

og.description: OKLAHOMA CITY (AP) — While some Republican-led states are exploring whether to expand Medicaid to include more lowincome residents, Oklahoma’s GOP leaders remain steadfastly opposed to the idea.
